Text:
For those without an eBook reader:
1. Open the file as if it was a ,zip file
2. Extract the files
3. Look in the ops/xhtml/ directory where you extracted the files
4. Open ch01.html, ch02.html, etc, with a web browser to read the book
I saw a video of a talk Dawkins gave at Berkeley about this book. It sounds exciting! Can't wait to give this a tumble. Thanks!
Excellent book. Excellent torrent; downloaded without problem, viewed in web browser. Thanks.
